courses.title: Introduction to Music Theory
courses.description: Learn the fundamental concepts of music theory, including scales, chords, and harmony, to build a strong foundation for understanding music.

courses.title: Guitar for Beginners
courses.description: A beginner-friendly course that covers the basics of playing the guitar, from tuning to simple chords and strumming patterns.

courses.title: Advanced Music Production
courses.description: Take your music production skills to the next level with advanced techniques in mixing, mastering, and digital audio workstations (DAWs).

courses.title: Piano Fundamentals
courses.description: Master the basic techniques of playing the piano, from reading sheet music to playing your first songs and understanding musical patterns.

courses.title: Music Composition and Arrangement
courses.description: Learn how to compose original music and arrange it for different instruments, enhancing your creativity and understanding of musical structures.
